bibl.title: Sayings of Jesus. Canonical and Non-Canonical Essays in Honour of Tijtze Baarda
bibl.note: I. At the Outset: Sayings of Jesus and New Testament Papyri at Oxyrhynchus. - II. The General Sociocultural Context Provided by Oxyrhynchus. - III. The Intellectual Environment at Oxyrhynchus. - IV. Literary-critical Activity at Oxyrhynchus and the New Testament Papyri.
EPP Eldon Jay, The New Testament Papyri at Oxyrhynchus in Their Social and Intellectual Context.
W.L. PETERSEN, J.S. VOS and H.J. DE JONGE (Edd.), Sayings of Jesus. Canonical and Non-Canonical Essays in Honour of Tijtze Baarda = Supplements to Novum Testamentum. 89 (Leiden, 1997) pp. 47-68.
